title: Memorials of his time,
author: Cockburn, Henry Cockburn
snippet: When the Tories returned to power they made Archibald Campbell of Clathick (who afterwards became Colquhoun of Killermont) their Lord Advo cate, and David Boyle (afterwards Lord Justice- Clerk), their Solicit or- General.

title: Robert Burns and Mrs. Dunlop;
author: Burns, Robert
snippet: To Glasgow, by Gabriel Watson, carrier for that place, who is to be heard of in the Grass Market, and leaves town twice a week, 1 2 copies (addrest to John Campbell,^ Esqr. of Clathick, Glasgow) .
